children.text: GFC Therapy in Pune - Advanced Hair & Skin Regeneration with The Skin Firm
Latest growth factor-based treatment for hair loss, acne scars, and anti-ageing under the care of Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh.

GFC Therapy (Growth Factor Concentrate Therapy) is an advanced, autologous (your own blood-derived) treatment that harnesses the power of natural growth factors to stimulate healing, regeneration, and rejuvenation.

A small amount of your blood is processed in a special kit to extract a highly concentrated solution of platelet-derived growth factors. These growth factors are then injected into the scalp (for hair regrowth) or skin (for scars, wrinkles, or dullness).
is more refined, more concentrated, and delivers better, faster results - with minimal discomfort and zero risk of allergies.
At The Skin Firm, Pune, we offer GFC Therapy for both hair restoration and skin rejuvenation, using advanced kits under dermatologist supervision.
Signs & Concerns GFC Therapy Can Treat
Hair thinning and weak hair roots
Why Choose GFC Therapy at The Skin Firm?

Hair fall and scars can affect confidence, and with so many treatments available, choosing the right one can feel confusing. At The Skin Firm, we focus on evidence-based, safe, and effective solutions like
Our goal is to help you regain your confidence with healthier hair and smoother, glowing skin.
We evaluate your scalp or skin concerns to design a personalised plan.
A small amount of blood is collected and processed in a specialised kit to extract concentrated growth factors.
For hair loss - GFC is injected into the scalp to stimulate dormant follicles.
For skin - GFC is injected or micro needled into targeted areas like scars, under-eyes, or wrinkles.
The growth factors trigger natural repair, collagen stimulation, and hair/skin rejuvenation over the next few weeks.
Types of GFC (Growth Factor Concentrate) Therapy We Offer in Pune
strengthens roots, reduces hair fall, promotes new growth
reduces fine lines and boosts elasticity
treats dark circles and hollows naturally
with PRP, lasers, or mesotherapy for best outcomes

Patient Testimonials for GFC Therapy in Pune
⭐ I was losing hair rapidly, but after 4 sessions of GFC hair treatment at The Skin Firm, my hair fall reduced drastically and I see new baby hair growing.

Who Can Benefit from GFC Therapy?
Men & women with early to moderate hair loss
Adults with thinning hair or weak follicles
Patients with acne scars or uneven texture
Individuals with fine lines, wrinkles, or early sagging
Patients with dark circles or under-eye hollows
Anyone looking for natural, safe regeneration
FAQs on GFC Therapy in Pune

items.question: What is the difference between GFC and PRP?

children.text: Both use your blood, but GFC is more refined and concentrated, with higher growth factor yield and better results.
Yes - since it uses your own blood-derived growth factors, it is completely safe and natural.
For hair, 4-6 sessions are recommended. For skin, 3-4 sessions give visible improvements.
Hair fall reduces within weeks; new growth shows in 2-3 months. Skin results appear in 3-4 weeks.
Mild pricks are felt, but numbing cream makes it comfortable.

items.question: Does it work for advanced baldness?

children.text: It works best for early to moderate hair loss. Advanced baldness may need hair transplant.

items.question: Can GFC help under-eye dark circles?

children.text: Yes - it improves pigmentation and hollowness naturally.
Results are long-lasting, but maintenance sessions may be needed yearly.
Minimal - you can resume daily routine the next day.

items.question: Can men and women both get GFC?

children.text: Yes - it is equally safe and effective for both.
